title: Genuine Joe GJO11961 Stainless Steel High Capacity Vacuum Airpot with Removable Lid, 3L Capacity
features: Vacuum-insulated design keeps drinks at optimal temperature for 12 hours
Push-button dispensing helps you easily control beverage amount
Removable lid allows simple filling and cleaning
For use with hot or cold beverages
description: High-capacity Vacuum Airpot keeps beverages hot or cold for up to 12 hours. Features all stainless steel construction with no glass liner to break. Lockable pressure powered push button easily dispenses beverages. Removable lid allows easy filling and cleaning.
